Text: Brenda Bennett:  She started off in a CBS Records band called Ken Lyon and Tombstone which toured with Mott the Hoople and Queen.

Text: Brenda Bennett:  Years later, through Roy Bennett, Prince gave her a "tough-girl, cigarette-smoking" persona and enlisted her in a girlgroup, Vanity 6, that he was attempting to create in 1982.
